humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the provided pathology report, the N stage is indicated as 1. This is explicitly stated in the report, so there is no need to apply the rules to infer the N stage. The report mentions 'N Stage: 1', which means the patient has metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The N stage is determined by the presence and extent of cancer involvement in the lymph nodes. According to the pathology report, the N Stage is 1, which indicates that there is cancer found in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes or in the inframammary nodes. This is stated in the report as 'N Stage: 1'.
